summary: App with an Invoice tab that supports multiple countries and VAT categories. Line items are limited to 3 per invoice across all countries.

existing_features.title: In the Invoice tab (frontend/src/pages/Invoice.tsx), enforce a maximum of 3 line items per invoice for all countries. When the invoice already has 3 line items, the 'Add Line Item' button (or equivalent control) must be disabled or hidden to prevent adding a fourth item.

new_feature_requests.summary: Limit invoice line items to a maximum of 3 per invoice for all countries in the Invoice tab
